name: pnp-list-formatting-generic-quick-charts-io
title: Quick Charts
shortDescription: This sample uses SharePoint column formatting to automatically generate multiple chart types (pie, doughnut, out-labeled pie, and polar area) visualizing task status distribution across To Do, In Progress, and Done states.
longDescription: This sample uses SharePoint column formatting to automatically generate various chart types including pie charts, doughnut charts, out-labeled pie charts, and polar area charts to visualize task status distribution across To Do, In Progress, and Done states. Each column displays a dynamically generated chart showing the distribution of tasks, making it easy to visualize project or task progress at a glance. Multiple chart style options are provided to suit different visualization preferences.

references.name: Use column formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use column formatting to customize how fields in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when a field is included in a list view, and the styles to be applied to those elements.

references.name: QuickChart.io Documentation
references.description: QuickChart is a web service that generates chart images on-the-fly. It's a replacement for the discontinued Google Image Charts API and supports Chart.js configurations.
